Smart Ice Tray: Create an ice tray with built-in sensors that can detect the temperature and humidity levels in the freezer. The tray can then adjust the shape and size of the ice cubes to optimize their cooling capacity, ensuring that your drinks are always served at the perfect temperature.

Color-Changing Ice Tray: Develop an ice tray that changes color based on the temperature of the drink it's in. For example, if you're enjoying a cold beverage, the ice cubes will turn blue, while a hot drink will turn red. This fun and unique feature will add an element of surprise and delight to your beverage experience.

Portion Control Ice Tray: Create an ice tray with built-in measurements to help you control your portion sizes. The tray can have different compartments with marked measurements, such as 1/4 cup, 1/2 cup, or 3/4 cup, allowing you to easily measure out the perfect amount of ice for your drink.

Compact Ice Tray: Design an ice tray that can be easily stored in a small space, such as a compact refrigerator or a camping trip. The tray can be collapsible or have a foldable design, making it easy to store and transport.

Smart Ice Tray with Built-In Water Filter: Create an ice tray with a built-in water filter that can remove impurities and contaminants from the water as it freezes. This feature will not only improve the taste of your drinks but also provide a healthier and safer drinking experience. The tray can also have a built-in indicator that alerts you when the ice cubes are ready to be removed.
